text: Collon is a village in Ireland. Collon may also refer to: *Albert Collon, Belgian ice hockey player *Dominique Collon, Belgian-born academic *Michel Collon, Belgian writer *Nicholas Collon (born 1983), British conductor *Mont Collon, mountain in the Italian Alps *Collon (confectionery) , a Japanese confectionery snack
title: Collon (disambiguation)
